shortcontents.shortcontent: I) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary" (fols. 3ra-112rb) I-1) Mäṣḥafä śǝrʿat, Introductory rite of al-Muʿallaqah and hymn (fols. 3ra-6va) I-2) Introductory exhortation and hymns (fols. 6va-9rb) I-3) ʾƎsäggǝd läki wä-ʾǝweddǝsäki... "I worship Thee..." (fol. 9rb-10rb) I-4) Täʾamrä Maryam "Miracles of Mary": 65 miracles (fols. 10ra-112rb)

copyists.copyist: Kidanä Maryam is mentioned as the scribe in the supplication on fol. 48rb.

donors.donor: Wälättä Mikaʾel and Kidanä Qal are mentioned in the supplication formulas throughout the Ms. The name of ʿAbiyä ʾƎgziʾ is written in the supplication formulas on fols. 110va and 111va.

dcomments.dcomment: End of the 19th - beginning of the 20th cent. (?)

txstates.txstate: Holes or tears amended on fols. 1, 16, 18, 24, 48, 67, 85, 89, 100. A big rectangular hole has been skilfully amended on fol. 64.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather cover (7 tools were used: double line fillet, double circle, interlaced dot fillet, corni-from, small x, criss-cross, double sine wave with dots).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.

squires.squire: A(2; s.l.: 1, stub after stub of 2; 2, stub after 2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – II(8/fol. 11r-18v) – III(8/fols. 19r-26v) – IV(8/fols. 27r-34v) – V(8/fols. 35r-42v) – VI(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 6; 7, stub after 1/fols. 43r-50v) – VII(8/fols. 51r-58v) – VIII(8/fols. 59r-66v) – IX(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 67r-74v) – X(8/fols. 75r-82v) –XI(8/fols. 83r-90v) – XII(8/fols. 91r-98v) – XIII(8/fols. 99r-106v) –XIV(8/fols. 107r-114v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; names of the donors; groups of lines on the incipit page of Texts I-1 and I-4; incipit of sections; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ለዓ፡ ዓለ for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም (e.g., fol. 98ra) ለዓ፡ ዓለም for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም (e.g., fol. 104vb) ለዓለ፡ ዓለም for ለዓለመ፡ ዓለም (e.g., fol. 105va)

otherdetails.otherdetail:
Text I-1 contains the hymns: Sälam läki ḫoḫǝtä mǝśraq ... "Salutation to you, Threshold of the East ..." (fol. 6ra).
Text I-2 includes the hymns: - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl bä-kǝlʾe Maryam ... "O my Lady, Holy Two-fold Virgin Mary ..." (fol. 8ra l.16-8rb) - ʾO-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam ʾǝmmu lä-ʾIyäsus Krǝstos kähali ... "O my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of Jesus Christ the Almighty ..." (fol. 8rb-va) (cp. ChRep no. 373) - Sälam läki ʾo-ʾәgzǝʾtǝyä qǝddǝst dǝngǝl Maryam ʾǝmmä mädḫǝn wä-ʾǝmmä bǝrhan ... "Salutation to you, o my Lady, Holy Virgin Mary, Mother of the Saviour and Mother of the Light ..." (fols. 8va-9rb).
The miracles of St. Mary (Text I-4) are not numbered.
Some fols. have a single ruled line at the top and at the bottom, very close to the edge of the folio (e.g., fols. 12rv, 17rv), possibly used as orientation for cutting parchment leaves.

extras.extra: - Fols. 1r-2v are unruled. - Text I-1 is partly written in small and compressed script (spaces for rubricated names are left unfilled). - Omissions are inserted interlineally: e.g., fols. 11vb, 18rb, 23vb, 36rb, 43vb, 58rb, 67ra, 80rb, 87vb, 93va, 97va. - Erasures are marked with thin lines: e.g., fols. 16ra, 26rb, 55vb, 77va, 91ra. - Spaces for rubricated names of the donors are left unfilled: fols. 92ra-98vb.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by the names of the feasts and other occasions written in frames in the upper margin, in the main hand, አመ፲ለመስከረም፡ ዘጼዴንያ: fol. 10ra ምንባብ፡ ዘመድኃኒ፡ ዓለም: fol. 12rb ዘመድኃኒ፡ ዓለም: fol. 14va ዘሰንበት: fol. 16vb አመ፡ ፲ወ፬ለጥቅምት፡ ዘገብረ፡ ክር: fol. 21ra ዘይነግር፡ ዜና፡ ስደታ: fol. 28rb ዘአባ፡ ሳሙኤል: fol. 30rb ምንባብ፡ ዘቍስቋም: fol. 31va ዘሰንበት: fol. 33va አመ፡ ፮፡ ለኅዳር፡ ዘዕለተ፡ ቍስቋም፡ ምንባብ: fol. 37vb ዘቅዱስ፡ ሚካኤል: fol. 52rb ምንባብ፡ አመ፡ ፫ለኅደር: fol. 55vb አመ፡ ፲ወ፯ለኅዳር፡ ምንባብ፡ ዘአኖረዎ፡ ንጉሥ: fol. 56va አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለኅዳር፡ ዘጽዮን: fol. 57ra ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ፡ ዘጽዮን: fol. 57vb ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ: fol. 59ra ምንባብ፡ ዘበዓታ፡ ቤተ፡ መቅደስ: fol. 60rb ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ፡ ዘበዓታ: fol. 61rb አመ፡ ፯፡ ለታኅሣሥ፡ አብርሃም፡ ሰርያዊ: fol. 63ra በዕለተ፡ ደቅስዮስ፡ ምንባብ: fol. 66rb ምንባብ፡ ዘዕለተ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወንጌላዊ: fol. 67ra አመ፡ ፳ወ፩ለጥር፡ ምንባብ: fol. 68va ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ፡ ዘዕረፍታ: fol. 70ra ዘኪዳነ፡ ምሕረት: fol. 71ra አመ፡ ፳ወ፱ለመጋቢት፡ ዘትስብእት፡ ወዘልደት: fol. 72va ዘልደት: fol. 75ra ዘትንሣኤ፡ ወዘአባ፡ ሊባኖስ: fol. 76vb ዘትንሣኤ፡ ሰንበት: fol. 79rb አመ፡ ፬ለግንቦት፡ ልደታ፡ ምንባብ: fol. 80rb ምንባብ፡ ዘዮሐንስ፡ አፈ፡ ወርቅ፡ አመ፡ ፲ወ፪ለግንቦት: fol. 82ra ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ: fol. 83va ዘደብረ፡ ምጥማቅ: fol. 84va ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ: fol. 90vb ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ፡ ዘደብረ፡ ምጥማቅ: fol. 92ra አመ፡ ፰፡ ለሰኔ: fol. 94ra ዘወትር: fol. 94vb ዘወትር: fol. 95rb ምንባብ፡ ዘሕንፀተ፡ ቤታ: fol. 95vb fol. 96vb: ዘሕንፀተ፡ ቤታ ዘወትር: fol. 97va ምንባብ፡ ዘቅዳሴ፡ ቤታ፡ አመ፳ወ፩ለሰኔ: fol. 98ra ዘወትር: fol. 98vb ዘፅንሰታ: fol. 99rb ዘፅንሰታ፡ ወዘልደታ: fol. 100ra ዝኒ፡ ከማሁ: fol. 101rb ዘሰንበት፡ ወዘደብረ፡ ታቦር: fol. 102rb ዘዘወትር: fol. 103va ዘፍልሰታ: fol. 104vb ዝኒ፡ ዘፍልሰታ: fol. 105va ዝኒ፡ ዘፍልሰታ: fol. 106va ዝኒ፡ ዘፍልሰታ: fol. 108ra ዘወትር: fol. 109vb ዘማርቆስ፡ ንጉሥ: fol. 110va.

miniature.details: The miniature is painted on unruled leaf.
